thread.section_title: AllGifts.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AllGifts.ie | allgifts.ie
thread.title: Maurice O'Carroll

author: Maurice O'Carroll
title: Maurice O'Carroll
text: I wanted an arnotts voucher and allgifts came up as an option. What an ordeal. Even though I clicked on arnotts voucher it appears I have to go through two sales processes. I still haven't received the voucher. I'd have Benn better off buying a One for All- it arrives the next day and accepted in Arnotts. It's for a gift and now it's too late as birthday is tomorrow and I needed to post it. I've learned from it.
